long: Meaning: to "walk" (literally or figuratively); causatively, to "carry" (in various senses).  Usage: × again, away, bear, bring, carry (away), come (away), depart, flow,   follow(-ing), get (away, hence, him), (cause to, made) go (away, -ing, -ne, one's way, out), grow, lead (forth), let down, march, prosper,   pursue, cause to run, spread, take away (-journey), vanish, (cause to) walk(-ing), wax, × be weak.  Source: a primitive root (compare "H1980");
